name: Impatience
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and affstrack.score.impatience < 100 then 
   OppGainedAff("impatience")
   if affstrack.score.hypochondria > 0 then

   end
end
matches: ^([\w'\-]+) suddenly starts scratching at an itch like mad\.$
^You glare at ([\w'\-]+)\, cursing ([\w'\-]+) with mental maladies\.$
